song.title: All Your Base
song.info:
In 2101, war was beginning. What happen? What happen? Somebody set up us the bomb. We get signal. What! What! Main screen turn on. It's you!! How are you gentlemen!! All your base are belong to us. You are on the way to destruction. What you say!! You have no chance to survive make your time. Ha ha ha ha . . . . Captain!!
Take off every 'zig'!! You know what you doing. Move 'zig'. For great justice.
Somebody set up us the bomb. What! You are on the way to destruction. We get signal.
[url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vfwqvUPIRkg[/url]
